text:
FunnelEnvy | Sr Software Engineer | Full-Time | Bay Area or REMOTE

We're a startup near SF that focuses on Delivering Return on Traffic for marketers through Account Based Marketing and Website Personalization.

Weâ€™re looking to bring on a Senior Software Engineer who can create and maintain a vision for our application design and architecture that will allow us to quickly iterate and test out new ideas and build on ideas that are successful.

It's lots and lots of data, delivered in real time to measurably improve the user experience.

Our stack: Node.js, Angular, MongoDB, Heroku / AWS, Hadoop, Redis

Our hiring process is an initial screen, in depth background review and a final team assessment.

Check out the full description here: http://www.funnelenvy.com/career/senior-software-engineer/

To apply send a cover & resume to talent [at] funnelenvy [dot] com
